mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CONTAINER.DOMAIN_ID, CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ, CONTAINER.CONTAINER_NAME, CONTAINER.CONTAINER_BODY, ( SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(PR.REL_SEQ) + COUNT(SR.REL_SEQ)) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM WMS_CONTAINER CT LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_PAGE_REL PR ON CT.CONTAINER_SEQ = PR.REL_SEQ AND PR.REL_TYPE='CT' LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_SKIN_REL SR ON CT.CONTAINER_SEQ = SR.REL_SEQ AND SR.REL_TYPE='CT' WHERE CT.CONTAINER_SEQ = CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ ) AS USE_YN FROM WMS_CONTAINER CONTAINER
SELECT COUNT(CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM WMS_CONTAINER CONTAINER

SELECT DISTINCT , PREL.REL_ORDER FROM WMS_PAGE_REL PREL, WMS_CONTAINER CONTAINER
AND PAGE_SEQ = #{keyword} AND PREL.REL_TYPE ='CT' AND PREL.REL_SEQ = CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM WMS_PAGE_REL PREL, WMS_CONTAINER CONTAINER
AND PAGE_SEQ = #{keyword} AND PREL.REL_TYPE ='CT' AND PREL.REL_SEQ = CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ

SELECT DISTINCT , REL_ORDER FROM WMS_SKIN_REL AS PREL, WMS_CONTAINER CONTAINER
AND PREL.SKIN_SEQ = #{keyword} AND PREL.REL_TYPE ='CT' AND PREL.REL_SEQ = CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM WMS_SKIN_REL PREL, WMS_CONTAINER CONTAINER
AND PREL.SKIN_SEQ = #{keyword} AND PREL.REL_TYPE ='CT' AND PREL.REL_SEQ = CONTAINER.CONTAINER_SEQ
